UPDATE split_order_config
enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId},
split_rute_name = #{splitRuteName},
split_rute_detail = #{splitRuteDetail},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
freight_rute_name = #{freightRuteName},
freight_rute_detail = #{freightRuteDetail},
state = #{state},
remarks = #{remarks},
WHERE id = #{id}
